A.title: Prefrontal Cortex
A.body: Executive function, attention, and impulse control are disrupted by nicotine’s modulation of dopamine and acetylcholine.

B.title: Hippocampus
B.body: Nicotine alters synaptic plasticity underlying memory formation; repeated exposure reinforces contextual cues.

C.title: Nucleus Accumbens
C.body: Dopamine surges here reinforce vaping as rewarding—driving craving and habit loops.

D.title: Amygdala
D.body: Emotion–cue pairing strengthens triggers; stress heightens relapse risk.
